badges.label: Data Source Disclosed
badges.description: ONS Annual Population Survey, 2012-15, ~165 k respondents, 0–10 well-being scale.

badges.label: 95% CI Error Bars
badges.description: Vertical lines show 95 % confidence intervals around each age-group mean.

badges.label: Truncated Axis
badges.description: Y-axes show only 6.8–8.2 (or 2.4–3.4 for anxiety), exaggerating differences.

badges.label: Open Government Licence
badges.description: ONS outputs are OGL v3.0—free reuse with attribution encouraged.

badges.label: Open Data
badges.description: Aggregated tables, micro-data and an API are openly available for download.

badges.label: Uncertainty Visualised
badges.description: Sampling variability is explicit; overlapping CIs may indicate no real difference.

badges.label: Outdated Data
badges.description: Last data point is 2015; well-being patterns may have shifted since.
